org.sat4j.tools.xplain

Interface MinimizationStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeletionStrategy, InsertionStrategy, QuickXplain2001Strategy, QuickXplainStrategy

    public interface MinimizationStrategy
extends Serializable
    Minimization technique used to reduce an unsatisfiable set of constraints into a minimally unsatisfiable subformula (MUS).
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    daniel
